scripts.postinstall: rm -rf node_mudules/web3-core/ node_mudules/web3-core-helpers/ node_mudules/web3-eth-contract/; cp -r node_modules/web3/packages/web3-core node_modules/; cp -r node_modules/web3/packages/web3-core-helpers node_modules/; cp -r node_modules/web3/packages/web3-eth-contract node_modules/;
